Package controller

Class CustomerOverview

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerOverview
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerOverview
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Author:
Thoai Tran
This is the Customer Overview Controller Class. This class provides the data stored for customers from the SQL DB. This is the main menu for users to add, modify, and delete customer records.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the implementation of the CustomerOverview method. Initializes the DB connection. Generates the table view. Property tags are set to match appointment constructor with table view columns.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - initialize
      resourceBundle - initialize.
